OOC: I was just informed we still had a Galvatorn, SoundWave and a 
Laserbeak. I hope you don't mind if I finish the tale. And I also send my 
apologies to there owners before hand.

  ::Still in the past come on did you think it would change so soon::

::Koj::

Koj thinks man it was really hard to get out of space port duty to as he 
gets closer to the he sees Lilly lying face down. As he lands Koj looks at 
the smoking hole where a blast ripped right through Lilly. "Lilly who did 
this?"


::SoundWave::

Laughing profoundly "I did Rumble go."


::Koj::

Koj picks up Lilly knowing what comes next.


::Rumble::

Hands change into hammers and starts pounding the earth and the cliffs 
cracks and breaks under Koj & Lilly.

::Koj::

As they fall Koj enters flight mode takes off carrying Lilly to Autobot 
base.

::Computer::

The wound is fatal she will die soon.

::Lilly::

As she starts to turn dark "Promise me you will become a hero Koj and that 
you will never forget me go touch the stars and beyond." Looks at the 
autobots there "Don't treat him driffent just because he's a Decepticons." 
As she gives him a silver Ring

::Koj::

Getting alittle scared "Its a promise." As he holds on to her hand and he 
watches Lilly turn black.
